caption.p: Table S1. A tabulation of the number of survey respondents by year and city
Table S2. Variables by survey question
Table S3. Behaviours and preventive outcomes among PWID across each survey year using respondent‐driven sampling (RDS) weighting
Table S4. Education‐level stratified by year and whether the PWID are clients of an NGO

Table S5. Unadjusted and adjusted odds ratios (with 95% confidence intervals) from mixed‐effect logistic regression*, of being an NGO client for various demographic characteristics – sensitivity analysis of Table 3 removing the ever imprisoned and HCV variables and therefore including the 2009 survey data
Table S6. Adjusted odds ratios (with 95% confidence intervals) from mixed‐effect logistic regression for education categories on various intervention related outcomes (corresponding to Table 4)
Table S7. Residual intraclass correlation for each outcome*
